definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Birds fly over oil on the water near Breton Sound Island.
sentences.chinese: 一大群鸟飞越靠近布莱顿水声岛的油渍水域。

sentences.english: The instrument is used when fly overwater in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 那仪器是在白天飞越水域时使用的。

sentences.english: A school of spotted eagle rays glides gracefully through the island-speckled waters of the Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 一群斑点鹰𫚉姿态优雅的掠过马尔代夫群岛水域。

sentences.english: Cross halcyon water area, you can see swim of far red glow.
sentences.chinese: 穿过宁静的水域，你会看见远处丹霞浮水。

sentences.english: Dead jellyfish float in the waters off the Chandeleur Islands.
sentences.chinese: 死去的水母漂浮在钱德尔勒尔群岛外海水域。

sentences.english: The Pentagon argued that the United States can do whatever it wants in international waters.
sentences.chinese: 五角大楼辩称美国可以在国际水域做任何事情。

sentences.english: Large elongated compressed food fish of european atlantic waters.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲大西洋水域身体细长扁平的食用鱼。

sentences.english: It was a native boat that had an accident in the waters ahead.
sentences.chinese: 在前面水域失事的是一艘土籍轮船。

sentences.english: The county licensed them to fish these waters.
sentences.chinese: 该县许可他们在这些水域里捕鱼。

sentences.english: The wakes of several ships are visible in the surrounding waters.
sentences.chinese: 在周围的水域可以看到不少出航的船只。

sentences.english: The water surrounding these islands is often referred to as the Danish Archipelago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿附近的水域通常被认为属于丹麦群岛的范围。

sentences.english: Some waters only allow single non barbed hooks.
sentences.chinese: 有些水域仅可使用无倒钩的单钩。

sentences.english: This would make the glider rise and fall as it entered warm and cold patches of water.
sentences.chinese: 这能让滑翔器在进入暖水域上升，在进入冷领域下降。

sentences.english: An Atlantic wolf fish (Anarchias lupus) and a shrimp ( Lebbeus polaris) in the waters off Norway.
sentences.chinese: 挪威水域的一条大西洋狼鱼和一只小虾的对峙。

sentences.english: Jelly box can be found in the waters around Asia and Australia.
sentences.chinese: 箱型水母能在亚洲和澳大利亚的水域里发现。

sentences.english: Flood period is seasonal or periodic flood rise phenomenon of rivers.
sentences.chinese: 汛是指江河等水域的季节性或周期性的涨水现象。

definition: Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
lagoon/erroneously written 瀉湖|泻湖[xie4 hu2]
